item.title: Navigating the Unknown: A Chat-Based Collaborative Interface for Personalized Exploratory Tasks
item.description: Collaborative Assistant for Personalized Exploration (CARE) enhances LLM chatbots for exploratory tasks by combining a multi-agent framework with a structured interface, delivering tailored solutions …
